item.description:
Join us for a  Latin dance party and Rosetta Stone raffle, no partners needed. Bring a snack or dessert to share, chat in Spanish for the first half hour and then continue chatting or join us on the dance floor. Marta Bravo Chavez will lead us in some dances from Mexico, and Marcela Crocker, from Peru, will lend us some Latin dance CDs for free form dancng. We may learn the basic salsa step before the night is over...

At the end of the evening we will raffle off the Rosetta Stone, Spanish Edition, to some lucky Spanish Meetup member. It's an amazing program to learn Spanish on your computer - google "Rosetta Stone, Spanish" to find out more.

Questions? Contact Karen at kdwo543210@yahoo.com or cell: 860-922-7997
item.how_to_find_us: There will be signs at the front desk!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Latin Dance Party & Rosetta Stone Raffle
